Version 1.4.5

Here are some of the highlights of recent releases:

  • fix - select error was not working with xs,sm,lg.. etc.
  • adjust select element according to invision
  • remove card body and subtitle color definition
  • new styles for suggester, bd flavor

Whatâs Next?

In addition to coordinating and supporting adoption and continuing to maintain and extend existing library items, the Cupcake team will continue to deliver new features, including:

  • Significant UI styling updates for the latest designs
  • More 3rd party support
  • Navigation components, responsive page layouts.
  • Continued documentation and ux best practices
  • Provide more knowledge and useage notes or do/don't do for components.

Explore. Contribute. Connect.

The Cupcake Design System is powered and improved by the teams that use it.
